# The `RecurrenceDescriptor` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recurrencedescriptor">RecurrenceDescriptor</a> is used to identify recurrences variables in a loop. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::RecurrenceDescriptor</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recurrencedescriptor">RecurrenceDescriptor</a> is used to identify recurrences variables in a loop.

Reduction is a special case of recurrence that has uses of the recurrence variable outside the loop. The method isReductionPHI identifies reductions that are basic recurrences.

Basic recurrences are defined as the summation, product, OR, AND, XOR, min, or max of a set of terms. For example: for(i=0; i&lt;n; i++) &#123; total += array&#91;i&#93;; &#125; is a summation of array elements. Basic recurrences are a special case of chains of recurrences (CR). See <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> for CR references. This struct holds information about recurrence variables.

Definition at line 77 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h">IVDescriptors.h</a>.

### isConditionalRdxPattern() {#a89705a5029e6850fc3d6445ebc775c15}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RecurrenceDescriptor::InstDesc RecurrenceDescriptor::isConditionalRdxPattern (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830e">RecurKind</a> Kind, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>

Returns true if the select instruction has users in the compare-and-add reduction pattern below.

The select instruction argument is the last one in the sequence.

sum.1 = phi ... ... cmp = fcmp pred %0, CFP add = fadd %0, sum.1 sum.2 = select cmp, add, sum.1

### isFixedOrderRecurrence() {#a203487323e0aa341b6c24f9ef20b5909}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RecurrenceDescriptor::isFixedOrderRecurrence (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; TheLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42; DT)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns true if Phi is a fixed-order recurrence.

A fixed-order recurrence is a non-reduction recurrence relation in which the value of the recurrence in the current loop iteration equals a value defined in a previous iteration (e.g. if the value is defined in the previous iteration, we refer to it as first-order recurrence, if it is defined in the iteration before the previous, we refer to it as second-order recurrence and so on). Note that this function optimistically assumes that uses of the recurrence can be re-ordered if necessary and users need to check and perform the re-ordering.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h/#l00207">207</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h">IVDescriptors.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp/#l01042">1042</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp">IVDescriptors.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns true if the recurrence kind is a floating point kind.

### isMinMaxPattern() {#ae318fdb278df4aaf9e229584fb769b41}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RecurrenceDescriptor::InstDesc RecurrenceDescriptor::isMinMaxPattern (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830e">RecurKind</a> Kind, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recurrencedescriptor/instdesc">InstDesc</a> &amp; Prev)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns a struct describing if the instruction is a llvm.

(s/u)(min/max), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa656aa475d13ec6a900414eadabe86b0">llvm.minnum</a>/maxnum or a <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select(ICmp(X, Y), X, Y)</a> pair of instructions corresponding to a min(X, Y) or max(X, Y), matching the recurrence kind <code>Kind</code>. <code>Prev</code> specifies the description of an already processed select instruction, so its corresponding cmp can be matched to it.

### isRecurrenceInstr() {#aa35caaec45d90bbc9c564181b77c109e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RecurrenceDescriptor::InstDesc RecurrenceDescriptor::isRecurrenceInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830e">RecurKind</a> Kind, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recurrencedescriptor/instdesc">InstDesc</a> &amp; Prev, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fastmathflags">FastMathFlags</a> FuncFMF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns a struct describing if the instruction &#39;I&#39; can be a recurrence variable of type &#39;Kind&#39; for a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> <code>L</code> and reduction PHI <code>Phi</code>.

If the recurrence is a min/max pattern of select(icmp()) this function advances the instruction pointer &#39;I&#39; from the compare instruction to the select instruction and stores this pointer in &#39;PatternLastInst&#39; member of the returned struct.

</MemberDefinition>

### isReductionPHI() {#a484f974fc232e862a87a6380d3a7587d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RecurrenceDescriptor::isReductionPHI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; TheLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recurrencedescriptor">RecurrenceDescriptor</a> &amp; RedDes, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/demandedbits">DemandedBits</a> &#42; DB=nullptr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42; AC=nullptr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42; DT=nullptr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42; SE=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns true if Phi is a reduction in TheLoop.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recurrencedescriptor">RecurrenceDescriptor</a> is returned in RedDes. If either <code>DB</code> is non-null or <code>AC</code> and <code>DT</code> are non-null, the minimal bit width needed to compute the reduction will be computed. If <code>SE</code> is non-null, store instructions to loop invariant addresses are processed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h/#l00194">194</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h">IVDescriptors.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp/#l00924">924</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp">IVDescriptors.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
